function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through contact with nature and outdoor environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading diseases such as Lyme disease, West Nile virus, and other zoonotic diseases.","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling animal populations in green spaces, promoting public awareness of disease risk, and implementing preventive measures such as insect repellents.","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies for tracking animal populations, public education campaigns, and development of eco-friendly insect repellents.","People":"Outdoor enthusiasts, hikers, joggers, and individuals living in close proximity to green spaces.","Owner":"Government health departments, environmental agencies, and public health organizations."}]}
